snippet.title: Dice Legacy | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉 https://www.gog.com/game/dice_legacy

Confront your fate in Dice Legacy, a dice-based survival city builder set on a mysterious ringworld. Roll and use your dice to establish a settlement, research technologies, build a society. Survive harsh winters and the onslaught of a mysterious population. Empower and forge dice together, in an attempt to control fate. Ascend dice and carry them through games in a unique roguelike experience.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
